name: CKNotification
desc: The abstract base class for CloudKit notifications.

items.name: init?(fromRemoteNotificationDictionary: [AnyHashable : Any])
items.desc: Creates a new notification using the specified payload data.

items.name: var notificationID: CKNotification.ID?
items.desc: The notification’s ID.

items.name: class CKNotification.ID
items.desc: An object that uniquely identifies a push notification that a container sends.

items.name: var notificationType: CKNotification.NotificationType
items.desc: The type of event that generates the notification.

items.name: enum CKNotification.NotificationType
items.desc: Constants that indicate the type of event that generates the push notification.

items.name: var containerIdentifier: String?
items.desc: The ID of the container with the content that triggers the notification.

items.name: var isPruned: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the system removes some push notification content before delivery.

items.name: var alertBody: String?
items.desc: The notification’s alert body.

items.name: var alertLocalizationKey: String?
items.desc: The key that identifies the localized text for the alert body.

items.name: var alertLocalizationArgs: [String]?
items.desc: The fields for building a notification’s alert.

items.name: var alertActionLocalizationKey: String?
items.desc: The key that identifies the localized string for the notification’s action.

items.name: var alertLaunchImage: String?
items.desc: The filename of an image to use as a launch image.

items.name: var soundName: String?
items.desc: The name of the sound file to play when a notification arrives.

items.name: var badge: NSNumber?
items.desc: The value that the app icon’s badge displays.

items.name: var category: String?
items.desc: The name of the action group that corresponds to this notification.

items.name: var subscriptionID: CKSubscription.ID?
items.desc: The ID of the subscription that triggers the notification.

items.name: var subscriptionOwnerUserRecordID: CKRecord.ID?
items.desc: The ID of the user record that creates the subscription that generates the push notification.

items.name: var title: String?
items.desc: The notification’s title.

items.name: var titleLocalizationKey: String?
items.desc: The key that identifies the localized string for the notification’s title.

items.name: var titleLocalizationArgs: [String]?
items.desc: The fields for building a notification’s title.

items.name: var subtitle: String?
items.desc: The notification’s subtitle.

items.name: var subtitleLocalizationKey: String?
items.desc: The key that identifies the localized string for the notification’s subtitle.

items.name: var subtitleLocalizationArgs: [String]?
items.desc: The fields for building a notification’s subtitle.
